summary: A wealthy but neurotic Southern belle finds herself trapped in the hideout of a gang of vicious bootleggers. The gang's leader lusts after her, and is determined not to let anything stand in the way of his having her.
cast: Miriam Hopkins|William Gargan|Jack La Rue|Florence Eldridge|Guy Standing|Irving Pichel|Jobyna Howland|William Collier Jr.|Elizabeth Patterson|James Eagles|Harlan Knight|Jim Mason|Louise Beavers|Arthur Belasco|Oscar Apfel|Clem Beauchamp|John Carradine|Frank Darien|Harold Goodwin|Henry Hall|Harold Miller|George C. Pearce|C.L. Sherwood|Grady Sutton|Kent Taylor
keywords: romantic rivalry|female sexual predator|house of prostitution|taming of the shrew|gossip
title: Secuestro
